id.description: Optional ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks

data.description: Required data structure defining the Gantt chart

title.description: Optional title displayed in the top left corner

startDate.description: Required start date for the timeline

endDate.description: Required end date for the timeline

currentTime.description: Optional current time to show indicator

timeScale.description: Required configuration for timeline scale and formatting

maxHeight.description: Optional maximum height of the component

tooltipFields.description: Optional fields to display in tooltips

expandedRowsData.description: Current expanded state of rows, mapping row IDs to boolean expanded state

lastExpandedRow.description: Information about the last row that was expanded or collapsed

styles.description: Optional custom styles for component parts

src/lib/components/internal/GanttHeader/.description:
HeaderRow renders the timeline header with evenly spaced time intervals.
Handles dynamic column widths based on available space.

headerHeight.description: Height of the header in pixels

title.description: Title displayed in the left column

styles.description: Optional custom styles for header row components

data.description:
Array of data points for the line chart. Each point must have a date and value.
@type {Array<{date: (string|Date), value: number}>}

color.description:
Primary color for the line. Should be a valid CSS color string.
@type {string}

position.description:
Left position of the chart as a percentage of timeline width.
@type {number}

width.description:
Width of the chart as a percentage of timeline width.
@type {number}
